biotools.summary:
KAUST Metagenomic Analysis Platform (KMAP), Enabling Access to Massive Analytics of Re-Annotated Metagenomic Data.

Custom BLAST server provided by SequenceServer (http://www.sequenceserver.com).

Supplementary Table 1, Gene Catalogs, ENA Project Ids, Links to GITs and KMAP Annotations.

KAUST Metagenomic Analysis Platform.
